A

authCiphertextSavedForLater(byte[], Object) - Method in interface com.google.capillary.android.CapillaryHandler
Signals that a Capillary ciphertext was saved to be decrypted after user authentication.

C

CapillaryHandler - Interface in com.google.capillary.android
Defines the interface for generating Capillary public keys and decrypting Capillary ciphertexts.
CapillaryHandlerErrorCode - Enum in com.google.capillary.android
These are the common errors that can occur in Capillary library.
com.google.capillary.android - package com.google.capillary.android
 

D

Attempts to decrypt the given Capillary ciphertext.
DecrypterManager - Class in com.google.capillary.android
Encapsulates the process of decrypting Capillary ciphertexts.
decryptSaved(CapillaryHandler, Object) - Method in class com.google.capillary.android.DecrypterManager
Attempts to decrypt any Capillary ciphertexts that were saved to be decrypted later.
deleteKeyPair(boolean) - Method in class com.google.capillary.android.KeyManager
Deletes the specified Capillary key pair.

E

H

handleData(boolean, byte[], Object) - Method in interface com.google.capillary.android.CapillaryHandler

K

R
